name: Polda 7
storyline: In his seventh adventure the detective Pankrác receives a mysterious message from a dark lord Vedro. Soon he finds out that the Earth is in peril as the aliens want to destroy the whole world. He must use his "native wit" in order to save the day.
summary: It´s the seventh entry in the point and click adventure series Polda. Gameplay-wise Polda 7 does not differ from previous entries, however for the first time in the series history there is also a secondary controlable character. Just like previous Polda games, this one is also heavy focused on situational humor.
